title: How to Draw the Krusty Krab

steps.title: Draw a large rectangle near the bottom and rightmost area of the paper.
steps.content: Draw a large rectangle near the bottom and rightmost area of the paper.

steps.title: Draw a curve line arcing the rightmost side of the rectangle.
steps.content: Draw a curve line arcing the rightmost side of the rectangle.

steps.title: Draw another curve arcing the other side of the rectangle.
steps.content: Draw another curve arcing the other side of the rectangle.

steps.title: In between arcs, draw a straight horizontal line, aligned near the center of the rectangle.
steps.content: In between arcs, draw a straight horizontal line, aligned near the center of the rectangle.

steps.title: Draw another horizontal line below the first line.
steps.content: Draw another horizontal line below the first line. It should be much closer to the bottom and stretching toward the farthest end of both arcs.

steps.title: On the left side of the initial drawing, draw a vertical line near it.
steps.content: On the left side of the initial drawing, draw a vertical line near it.

steps.title: On top of the vertical line, attach a pine-nut-shaped oval in a position that would look like a flag on a pole.
steps.content: On top of the vertical line, attach a pine-nut-shaped oval in a position that would look like a flag on a pole. Perpendicular to it and aligned with the vertical line, draw a clam-shaped oval on top (with its most volumed part pointing upwards).

steps.title: Start drawing the Krusty Krab's farthest arc and its base.
steps.content: Start drawing the Krusty Krab's farthest arc and its base.

steps.title: Within this arc, trace the Krusty Krab's diagonally checkered windows.
steps.content: Within this arc, trace the Krusty Krab's diagonally checkered windows.

steps.title: Trace the other arc and its base.
steps.content: Trace the other arc and its base.

steps.title: Draw the roof top with a chimney at the center.
steps.content: Draw the roof top with a chimney at the center.

steps.title: Add details (wooden texture and banners).
steps.content: Add details (wooden texture and banners).

steps.title: Draw the lower part of the Krusty Krab.
steps.content: Draw the lower part of the Krusty Krab.

steps.title: Trace the lot and road coming towards the Krusty Krab's entrance.
steps.content: Trace the lot and road coming towards the Krusty Krab's entrance.

steps.title: Start tracing the clam-shaped signage on top of a bamboo pole.
steps.content: Start tracing the clam-shaped signage on top of a bamboo pole.

steps.title: Draw the words "the Krusty Krab" within the topmost shell.
steps.content: Draw the words "the Krusty Krab" within the topmost shell.

steps.title: Remove unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Remove unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing as desired.
steps.content: Color the drawing as desired.

steps.title: Draw a large rectangle near the bottom and center area of the paper.
steps.content: Draw a large rectangle near the bottom and center area of the paper.

steps.title: From both bottom corners and within the rectangle, draw a line in acute angle from the side.
steps.content: From both bottom corners and within the rectangle, draw a line in acute angle from the side.

steps.title: Near the base of the rectangle, draw a horizontal line piercing through both sides.
steps.content: Near the base of the rectangle, draw a horizontal line piercing through both sides.

steps.title: Draw another horizontal line above the first one, within and center of the rectangle.
steps.content: Draw another horizontal line above the first one, within and center of the rectangle.

steps.title: From the center horizontal line, draw a center vertical line going down to the base of the rectangle.
steps.content: From the center horizontal line, draw a center vertical line going down to the base of the rectangle.

steps.title: On the left side of the initial drawing, draw a slightly curved vertical line near it.
steps.content: On the left side of the initial drawing, draw a slightly curved vertical line near it.

steps.title: On top of the vertical line, attach a pine-nut-shaped oval in a position that would look like a flag on a pole.
steps.content: On top of the vertical line, attach a pine-nut-shaped oval in a position that would look like a flag on a pole. Perpendicular to it and aligned with the vertical line, draw a clam-shaped oval on top (with its most volumed part pointing upwards).

steps.title: Below the rectangle, draw a pair of lines that starts close and then spreads away as they go farther from the rectangle.
steps.content: Below the rectangle, draw a pair of lines that starts close and then spreads away as they go farther from the rectangle.

steps.title: Start tracing the sides and top of the Krusty Krab.
steps.content: Start tracing the sides and top of the Krusty Krab.

steps.title: Add details (wooden texture and banners).
steps.content: Add details (wooden texture and banners).

steps.title: Draw the lower part of the Krusty Krab, also of wooden texture.
steps.content: Draw the lower part of the Krusty Krab, also of wooden texture.

steps.title: Draw the double doors and glass store windows.
steps.content: Draw the double doors and glass store windows.

steps.title: Start tracing the clam-shaped signage on top of a bamboo pole.
steps.content: Start tracing the clam-shaped signage on top of a bamboo pole.

steps.title: Draw the words "the Krusty Krab" within the topmost shell.
steps.content: Draw the words "the Krusty Krab" within the topmost shell. Add details to the surrounding environment.

steps.title: Remove unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Remove unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing as desired.
steps.content: Color the drawing as desired.
